item.title: [Python] Plot data for each prefecture on a map (number of cars owned nationwide)
item.description: # Purpose of this article Draw a prefecture-level color-coded map like this in Python For municipal level, go to here By the way, the data used the number of passenger cars owned nationwide. At the end of the page is Code List. Commentary Use the library japanmap to create a colored map pip install japanmap Other library preparation import numpy as np import pandas as pd import cv2 from PIL import Image import matplotlib.
